channel.title: 317 Thieving Stalls
channel.description: I was trying to add general stalls to server at home (edgeville), I created the object at home and i changed the leveling exp and the money you get from stealing the stalls. For some reason, it give me like 100k exp and 990mill I did everything, spawned all stalls still same exp and same money. i even look at the client.java, it shows normal not 100k exp and 990mill. How can i fix it?

item.title: 317 Thieving Stalls
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

try finding these and see if this helps

Public Void

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); }

Stall Codes

} } if(objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve a baked cake", 53, 75*playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 50k", 75, 650*playerLevel[17], 995, 50000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 75k", 1, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 75000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 75k", 1, 35*playerLevel[17], 995, 75000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4876){ TheifStall("general stall", "And Recieve 2Mil", 1, 6000*playerLevel[17], 995, 2000000, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve a tomatoe", 60, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340); }
GOODLUCK!
